CompilationError.why: Syntax error, type mismatch, or missing declaration
fix: Check the file and line number in error message
Verify all imports are correct
Check for missing semicolons or brackets
Ensure variable types match their usage

RevertError.why: Contract logic caused revert, often from require() or revert() statement
fix: Check the revert reason in the error message
Verify all require() conditions are met
Review contract logic for revert conditions
Check if contract state allows the operation
Check the require condition that failed
Verify inputs meet the requirement
Review contract state before the require
Add better error messages to require() statements

GasError.what: Gas estimation failed or limit exceeded
GasError.why: Transaction requires more gas than available or estimated
fix: Increase gas limit in transaction
Optimize contract code to reduce gas usage
Break transaction into smaller operations
Check for infinite loops or excessive storage operations

DeploymentError.why: Constructor failed, insufficient gas, or network issue
fix: Check constructor parameters are correct
Increase gas limit for deployment
Verify network connection
Check contract bytecode size limits
